name: Solitaire Battle
description:
Choose your fantasy hero and do battle against other fighters in the world of tri-peaks solitaire

Gameplay

  • A combat system based on classic tri-peaks solitaire gameplay
  • Connect long chains of cards to gain SP, then use your ability to defeat enemies
  • Each character has a different ability that affects the game board in a different way

Features

  • Five selectable characters, plus six opponents to face in arcade mode
  • Two possible boards to play on
  • Battle with up to two players in versus mode
  • A tough five-round arcade mode which tracks your scores (but doesn't save them yet)

Follow the development of Solitaire Battle on Twitter: @diabolodev
